wikipedia_page.main: David Hawker (born 29 November 1958) is an English former footballer who made 130 appearances in the Football League playing for Hull City and Darlington in the 1970s and 1980s. A midfielder, he also played non-league football for clubs including Bishop Auckland, Brandon United, Whitley Bay, for whom he scored as Bay won the 1986–87 Northumberland Senior Cup final, and South Bank.
